original_text: I want God to give me what I ask him for. I want him to answer my prayer. I want God to give me what I ask him for. I want him to answer my prayer. I want God to give me what I ask him for.
korean_text: 나의 간구를 누가 들어 줄 것이며 나의 소원을 하나님이 허락하시랴

sentences.original_text: I want God to give me
I want him to answer my prayer
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 그에게 내 기도에 응답하기를 원합니다
